description:
She can see dead people…she just chooses to ignore them. That’s Miko’s plan, anyway, but it doesn’t seem to be working for her in this love letter to the horror genre that will send shivers down your spine—and occasionally tickle your funny bone.

(Source: Funimation)
synonyms: มิเอรุโกะจัง ใครว่าหนูเห็นผี
Mieruko: Gadis yang Bisa Melihat Hantu

tags.name: Ghost
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a ghost.

tags.name: Primarily Teen Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of teen characters.

tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

tags.name: Youkai
tags.description: Prominently features supernatural creatures from Japanese folklore.

tags.name: Urban Fantasy
tags.description: Set in a world similar to the real world, but with the existence of magic or other supernatural elements.

tags.name: Body Horror
tags.description: Features characters who undergo horrific transformations or disfigurement, often to their own detriment.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Nudity
tags.description: Features a character wearing no clothing or exposing intimate body parts.

tags.name: Gods
tags.description: Prominently features a character of divine or religious nature.

tags.name: Bullying
tags.description: Prominently features the use of force for intimidation, often in a school setting.
